amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funding for the use of force pursuant to the Authorization for Use of Military Force, or AUMF, effective on December 31, 2014, when the last American combat troops will rotate out of Afghanistan and the responsibility for security will have passed to the Afghan people.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 73 printed in House Report 113-170 to prohibit funding the use of force pursuant to the Authorization for Use of Military Force (AUMF, PL 107-40) effective on December 31, 2014--concurrent with the end of our combat role in Afghanistan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A064) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 236 (Roll no. 410).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A064) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 236 (Roll no. 410).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A064) offered by Mr. Schiff.
